DOC.criteria: Subjects familial hypercholesterolemia : Aged 1865 year Carrier mutation LDL receptor gene Controls : Aged 1860 year HDLcholesterol > 1.1 mmol/L Triglycerides < 1.7 mmol/L Fasting blood glucose < 6.1 mmol/L Normal blood pressure ( < 130/85 ) Subjects previous history cardiovascular disease Subjects Type 2 diabetes Were pregnant nursing ; Subjects history cancer Subjects acute liver disease , hepatic dysfunction , persistent elevation serum transaminase Subjects secondary hyperlipidemia due cause History alcohol drug abuse within past 2 year hormonal treatment Subjects situation condition , opinion investigator , may interfere optimal participation study
